website_summaries.verdict: Excellent processing power for the money and very portable.
pros: Capable of high-level performance from its 2.5GHz Intel Dual-Core processor and 8GB of DDR4 Ram
14" screen and 3.7 LB weight grant excellent flexibility, as do the plethora of USB/HDMI ports
Features a 1TB hard drive for storage and 720p webcam
cons: Does not include backlit keyboard, optical drive, or Ethernet port

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find better specs for the price (CPU/RAM/SSD wise) Really good performance ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the 14 inch 320S (i5-7200 CPU, 8GB, 256 GB SSD) If you do not care about display quality and/or gaming, this laptop fits the bill. Couldn't find better specs for the price (CPU/RAM/SSD wise) Really good performance (No hard core gaming of course, I got this just as a backup to run some simulations and this laptop doesn't break a sweat, whereas my macbook air does), Light Weight (of course its not macbook-like, but it isn't heavy), decent battery life. I'm happy with this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Sagar

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Very good laptop. I really like the solid state drive which makes most programs run extremely fast. I use this computer for basic functions: word documents, spreadsheets, email, net surfing, photos, videos, etc. Works like a champ! I am very pleased. It is light and very portable. Screen isn't the best, but for the money it is a great computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this computer and frankly I'm shocked they are ...
customer_reviews.text: The specs on this laptop are unbeatable for the price. The solid state drive, RAM, and processor make this a very quick laptop and the battery lasts forever (10 hours). It is also very sleek looking and feeling. I am very happy with this computer and frankly I'm shocked they are not flying off the shelves faster.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Larson

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this computer for my wife ,she loves it ,powers up ffast light and great screen. The price wsa right.Dont hesitate just buy it you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Fleres

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the headline it stopped working. Not because I dropped it or damaged it. It just stopped turning on all the way one day. It was kind of terrible for someone like me too, I am used to Chromebooks and MacBooks so the constant macfee adds and hourly pop ups were especially annoying to me. Should have just gotten a cheaper chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty description
customer_reviews.text: Advertised was a convertible tablet - which was what I needed. Received was a laptop. I doubled checked the description upon receipt, discovering it was not my fault. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Verrill

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer 1 month ago. I am so happy so far. I am computer science major and I bought it for high performance. It would be a really good buy for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammet Ceceli

customer_reviews.title: Screen isn’t great, but everything else is.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great overall. The only complaint I have is that the screen is pretty dim/dull compared to any computer I’ve had before. He colors are just slightly off and less vibrant than they perhaps should be.
customer_reviews.author: Hari Nam Elliott

customer_reviews.title: The laptop very well! But I thought the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop very well! But I thought the screen was IPS, it's not IPS. But the machine works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gimenez Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop. Lightweight, amazing battery life, excellent sound and clear pictures. I have had many different ones, but this so far has been the best.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Vinny

customer_reviews.title: However only issue I have with it is that the exterior get's scratched easily.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop going into my senior year of college. Gotten the job done and more while still remaining in pristine condition. However only issue I have with it is that the exterior get's scratched easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great for students
customer_reviews.text: Love the laptop, works incredibly well. Perfect for my needs as a student. I can even play World of Warcraft on it when I’m waiting in between classes. So that’s nice. Only problem is the battery life. It’s way short. I have to charge it a lot, and I only got it less than a month ago. But other than that it’s fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: A great value! Such a pleasure to enjoy the speed of a solid state hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: S. Skootsky

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with Lenovo
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with the performance of this laptop. I used to buy Dell but I am frustrated with their poor quality. I will purchase Lenovo again..
customer_reviews.author: jdrake10

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Essentially stopped working within 6 months of use, don't buy this machine
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Finch

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working pretty much right after I powered it up. First it took forever to install a bunch of Microsoft updates, then the screen went blank and failed to reappear when it went into idle mode. I’ll never buy another Lenovo product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: very poor performance, i have returned it for repair once and the problem remains.
customer_reviews.author: steve bollert

customer_reviews.title: It did get pretty hot when I first used it
customer_reviews.text: I carry it in my backpack to school. The screen is big enough. It did get pretty hot when I first used it, but now it's fine. However, I draw on computer and the color on laptop does not match the actual color I see on phones and other computers. Maybe you can figure it out and re-calibrate color and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Y.

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I don't think you can get a better laptop for the price. It's fast, light, looks amazing and runs amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shoaf

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Product was supposed to be a new computer, but packaging looked as if it was used before. Computer ended up being defective and would not even turn on. Returned promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except the comparatively low resolution display 1366*768.
customer_reviews.author: cjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom, it was exactly what she wanted. light weight largish screen without bulk. Runs fast.
customer_reviews.author: melissa norris

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this one
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this laptop. The backside is made of poor quality plastic. I have found a little crack while I received it.
customer_reviews.author: prashanta saha

customer_reviews.title: Would be great, but the display kind of ruins it.
customer_reviews.text: If it weren't for the screen quality, I would be so happy with this laptop. It boots up immediately with the solid state drive, has great components for the price, and the build feels nice to the touch with the aluminum case and firm keys. I thought the people who complained that the HD wasn't good enough were just being picky, and bought it anyway. It turns out that it's annoying to use on a daily basis because the screen is so washed out. Even just for browsing the web or word processing, text that is supposed to be black is only gray. I haven't gotten used to it; it continually bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: ... as a backup computer for 150$ at staples works great. >Pros - Fast & Smooth - Has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this laptop as a backup computer for 150$ at staples works great. >Pros - Fast & Smooth - Has a SSD - Plenty of Ram >Cons - No Ethernet -decent screen res was expecting to have at least 1920x1080 Overall a great laptop
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo crashes after 1 year or 2
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of them crashed after 1 year or so, got it repaired by them again crashed and by the time they said warranty is over. Do you want to spend your money for this waste?
customer_reviews.author: Kurian

customer_reviews.title: If you are reading this buy this pc you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Amazing design and so far this pc exceed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto V.

product_meta.title: Lenovo 320S Business Laptop PC 14" LED-Backlit Display Intel i5-7200U Processor 8GB DDR4 RAM 256GB SSD Dolby Audio HDMI 802.11ac Webcam Bluetooth 3.7 lbs Windows 10-Silver
product_meta.description:
Capacity:8GB RAM | 256GB SSDPRODUCT OVERVIEW
The IdeaPad 320S is a sleek, lightweight laptop that packs a processing punch. Featuring a host of upgrades from the 120S series, the newly redesigned IdeaPad 320S offers 7th Gen Intel Core i processing, additional memory and SSD storage for lightning-fast performance, startling HD clarity and premium metal details. The IdeaPad 320s is designed to meet your productivity and entertainment needs in style.
KEY SPECIFICATIONS:
Display: 14" HD Widescreen LED Display
Screen Resolution: 1366 x 768
Processor: Intel Dual-Core I5-7200U, 2.50GHz up to 3.10GHz
Cache: 3 MB Smartcache
Memory: 8GB 2133MHz DDR4 SDRAM
Solid State Drive: 256GB Solid State Drive
Optical Drive: No Optical Drive
Operating system: Windows 10 Home 64 bit
Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 Integrated
Audio: Dolby Audio
Bluetooth: Bluetooth 4.1
Wireless Connectivity: 802.11ac
Webcam: Built-in HD 720p webcam
Speaker: Stereo Speakers
Ports: 1 x USB 3.1 Type-C, 1 x USB 3.0, 1 x USB 2.0, 1 x HDMI, 1 x Headphone/microphone combo jack, 1 x Card Reader
Color: Silver
Battery: 3-cell lithium-ion
Dimensions L x W x H: 9.4" x 12.9" x 0.8"
Weight: 3.73lbs
feature_bullets: Intel Dual-Core I5-7200U Processor, 2.50GHz Base Frequency, up to 3.10GHz, 3 MB SmartCache
8GB 2133MHz DDR4 SDRAM, 256GB Solid State Drive, No Optical Drive
14" HD ( 1366 x 768 ) Widescreen LED Display, Intel HD Graphics 620 Integrated
1 x USB 3.1 Type-C, 1 x USB 3.0, 1 x USB 2.0, 1 x HDMI, 1 x Headphone/microphone combo jack, 1 x Card Reader
Windows 10 Home 64 bit, Built-in 720p HD Webcam, 802.11ac, Bluetooth 4.1, Dolby Audio, up to 12 hours battery life
